snippet: The medical series "House" will come to an end this season.
abstract: The medical series "House" will come to an end this season.
lead_paragraph: One of the most popular and highly regarded television dramas of the past decade, the medical series "House," will come to an end this season, the show's producers and the Fox network announced Wednesday. The decision was cast as the choice of the producers. In a statement, they said, "The producers have always imagined House as an enigmatic creature; he should never be the last one to leave the party. How much better to disappear before the music stops, while there is still some promise and mystique in the air." Read more »

headline.main: After Eight Seasons, 'House' Slated to End
